title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 328.11 - Responsibilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 328.11 - Responsibilities

State Regulations

Executive and administrative officers shall have such
powers, duties and responsibilities as may be assigned by the board of trustees
or by the chancellor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
328.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
